verses.verse: "I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you can <S%H3201>do<s%> all <S%H4209>things,<s%> and that no purpose of yours can be <S%H1219>restrained.<s%>

You <S%H5956>asked,<s%> 'Who is this who hides <S%H6098>counsel<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%>' therefore I have <S%H5046>uttered<s%> that which I did not <S%H995>understand,<s%> things too <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> for <S%H3045>me,<s%> which I didn't know.
You <S%H8085>said,<s%> 'Listen, <S%H1696>now,<s%> and I will speak; I will <S%H7592>question<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> and you will answer me.'
I had <S%H8085>heard<s%> of you by the <S%H8088>hearing<s%> of the <S%H241>ear,<s%> but now my <S%H5869>eye<s%> sees <S%H7200>you.<s%>
Therefore I <S%H3988>abhor<s%> <S%H5162>myself,<s%> and repent in <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>"

It was <S%H310>so,<s%> that after <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> "My <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H8147>you,<s%> and against your two <S%H7453>friends;<s%> for you have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of me the thing that is <S%H3559>right,<s%> as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> Job <S%H347>has.<s%>

Now <S%H3947>therefore,<s%> take to yourselves <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and offer <S%H5927>up<s%> for yourselves a burnt <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H5375>you,<s%> for I will accept <S%H6440>him,<s%> that I not <S%H6213>deal<s%> with you according to your <S%H5039>folly.<s%> For you have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of me the thing that is <S%H3559>right,<s%> as my <S%H5650>servant<s%> Job <S%H347>has.<s%>"

So <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> and <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> and Yahweh <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>Job.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H347>Job,<s%> when he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for his <S%H7453>friends.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3254>gave<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> twice as much as he had <S%H4932>before.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> there to him all his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and all his <S%H269>sisters,<s%> and all those who had been of his <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H6440>before,<s%> and <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with him in his <S%H1004>house.<s%> They <S%H5162>comforted<s%> <S%H5162>him,<s%> and consoled him concerning all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> on <S%H376>him.<s%> Everyone also <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H259>a<s%> piece of <S%H7192>money,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> ring of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

So <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the latter <S%H319>end<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> more than his <S%H7225>beginning.<s%> He had <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> female <S%H860>donkeys.<s%>

He <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first,<s%> <S%H3224>Jemimah;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H7103>Keziah;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third,<s%> Keren <S%H7163>Happuch.<s%>

In all the <S%H776>land<s%> were no <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> so <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> as the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H347>Job.<s%> Their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> this <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
